subject: FBI Headquarters in Washington
body:
FBI Headquarters in Washington, D.C.
J. Edgar Hoover Buildings
935 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW
Washington, D.C. 20535-00010.
ATTENTION: xxx.
GOOD NEWS FOR YOU FROM THE FBI UNITED STATES. WE HAD A MEETING WITH INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND AND FEDERAL GOVERNMENT OF NIGERIA/ BENIN OVER YOUR LONG OVERDUE CONTRACT PAYMENT AND  WE AGREED WITH THEM THAT YOUR FUND SHOULD NOT COST YOU ANYTHING BECAUSE IS YOUR MONEY, WHICH WE FINALLY REACHED AN AGREEMENT YESTERDAY THAT ALL THE PAYMENT WILL BE PAID VIA ATM SMART CARD WHICH IS THE SIMPLEST WAY TO TRANSFER HUGE AMOUNT OF MONEY TO AVOID COST OF TRANSFER AND OTHER STATUTORY DOCUMENTS, WHICH WE STRETCHED TO HAVE A STRONG AGREEMENT OVER THE PAYMENT THAT WILL COST YOU ONLY $95 USD FOR DELIVERY OF YOUR ATM SMART CARD VIA  UPS OR FED EX DELIVERY COMPANY DEPENDING ON YOUR CHOICE.
HOWEVER, 
YOU HAVE ONLY TWO WORKING DAYS TO SEND THIS REQUIRED DELIVERY FEE OF $95USD
 TO FEDEX OR UPS COURIER COMPANY FOR DELIVERING OF YOUR CARD BECAUSE YOUR CARD WILL BE  DISPATCH TO THEM IMMEDIATELY. AND IF WE DON’T HEAR FROM YOU WITH THE PAYMENT INFORMATION; THE FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION WILL NOT  HESITATE BY GIVEN INSTRUCTION TO FEDERAL GOVERNMENT OF NIGERIA AND THE INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT TO CANCEL YOUR PAYMENT THAT HAS BEEN ALREADY APPROVED AND PROGRAMMED IN AN ATM SMART CARD, YOU MUST BE CONSCIOUS OF THIS PROJECT.
HOWEVER, BE INFORMED THAT THE PART PAYMENT, WHICH IS 3,500.000.00 MILLION U.S. DOLLARS HAS BEEN LOADED IN YOUR ATM SMART CARD AND YOUR FUND WHICH IS IN TUNE OF 10,500.000.00 MILLION U.S. DOLLARS WILL COME IN BATCHES OF 3,500.000.00 MILLION U.S. DOLLARS  AND THIS IS THE FIRST BATCH OF YOUR PART PAYMENT.YOUR PAYMENT WOULD BE SENT TO YOU VIA UPS OR FEDEX, BECAUSE WE HAVE SIGNED A CONTRACT WITH THEM WHICH SHOULD EXPIRED BY DECEMBER 31 2023. BELOW ARE FEW LIST OF TRACKING NUMBERS YOU CAN TRACK FROM UPS WEBSITE(WWW. UPS.COM) TO CONFIRM PEOPLE LIKE YOU WHO HAVE RECEIVED THEIR PAYMENT SUCCESSFULLY. HOWEVER,BE ADVISED BASED  ON OUR RECOMMENDATION/INSTRUCTIONS THAT YOUR COMPLETE CONTRACT/INHERITANCE OVER-DUE FUNDS WILL BE RELEASED IMMEDIATELY UPON YOUR CONTACT TO THE NEWLY APPOINTED PAYMENT OFFICER THAT WILL CARRY OUT THE DISPATCH OF YOUR ATM SMART CARD TO UPS COURIER COMPANY WITH THE PAYMENT FOR DELIVERY OF YOUR PACKAGED. YOU ARE THEREFORE ADVISED TO CONTACT MR.TERRY MACK. IMMEDIATELY AS STATED BELOW  AS THE APPOINTED DIRECTOR OF ATM SMART CARD/FOREIGN OPERATION DEPT AND ASK HIM ON HOW AND WHERE TO SEND THE PAYMENT OF  $95.00 ONLY TO FED EX OF UPS COURIER COMPANY.
CONTACT PERSON: MR.TERRY MACK.
PRIVATE EMAIL ADDRESS:(
settlementofficeatmcardunit@gmail.com
)
PRIVATE DIRECT TELL +234-910188117
YOU'RE ADVISED TO CONTACT HIM IMMEDIATELY WITH ABOVE INFO SO AS TO ENABLE HIM FACILITATE A SPEEDY PROCESSING AND RELEASE OF YOUR DELIVERY SINCE IS THE ONLY $95.00 USD THAT IS KEEPING YOUR ATM SMART CARD. 
CONTACT HIM WITH THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION AS BELOW:
1. YOUR FULL NAME...........................
2. CONTACT ADDRESS ........................................
3..OCCUPATION..........................................
4. PHONE NO..................
5. 
YOUR  ID
....................................................
NOTE: YOU'RE ADVISED TO FURNISH  YOUR INFORMATION TO INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT DIRECTOR REV JAMES LONG WITH YOUR CORRECT AND VALID DETAILS TO ENABLE HIM EXPEDITE SPEEDY ACTION ON THE PROCESSING OF YOUR PAYMENT. WE EXPECT YOUR SWIFT RESPONSE TO THIS EMAIL TO ENABLE US MONITOR THIS PAYMENT AND THE DELIVERY OF YOUR ATM SMART CARD EFFECTIVELY THEREBY MAKING CONTACT WITH THE INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT AS DIRECTED TO AVOID FURTHER DELAY.YOU’RE ALSO EXPECTED TO FOLLOW HIS ADVICE AND DIRECTIVES TO AVOID DELAY IN RELEASING YOUR PAYMENT BECAUSE YOUR PAYMENT FILE HAS ALREADY BEEN MOVED TO IMF OFFICE FOR PROCESSING AND VERIFICATION.
CONGRATULATIONS AND YOURS IN SERVICE,
CHRISTOPHER A. WRAY
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE
WASHINGTON, D.C. 
20535.

subject: Re: FBI Headquarters in Washington
body:
Hello there,

Wow, this sounds like quite an exciting opportunity! I'm thrilled to hear that my long overdue contract payment is finally being sorted out. The ATM Smart Card method seems very convenient indeed.

I do have a few questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned that the payment will be sent in batches of million dollars - could you please clarify how many batches there will be and when I can expect each one?

Also, could you provide more details about the UPS or FedEx delivery? How long does it usually take for the card to arrive once it's dispatched? And is there any way to track its progress?

Lastly, I'd love to know more about this project that I must be conscious of. What exactly does it involve?

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Leslie

body:
Hello Mr. Mack Terry,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this ATM card and its potential benefits. I must say, it sounds like a unique opportunity.

However, I do have a few questions that I hope you could help me understand better. Firstly, could you please elaborate on how this ATM card works? Is it similar to a regular bank-issued ATM card?

Secondly, you mentioned that the card is already loaded with an approved sum of money. Could you clarify how this amount was determined and why it has been preloaded onto the card?

Lastly, regarding the shipment fee, could you provide more details about what this fee covers? Is it just for shipping or are there any additional services included in this cost?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Leslie
